subject: Logger in a JUnit test don't log with Ant?!
msgSnippet: I wrote a JUnit test where I used java.util.logging.Logger to put some information in a file. If I start that JUnit test with Eclipse or on the console with
messageBody:
I wrote a JUnit test where I used java.util.logging.Logger to put some
information in a file. If I start that JUnit test with Eclipse or on
the console with java TheJunitTest all works fine and the log will
created.
But if I start that JUnit test within an ant build.xml no log from my
logger is created.

And I don't know why. Any suggestions?
